text: This is a List of Privy Counsellors of the United Kingdom appointed during the reign of Queen Victoria, from 1837 to 1901. ==Victoria== ===1837=== *The Earl of Ilchester (1787–1858) *The Earl of Surrey (1791–1856) ===1838=== *Stephen Lushington (1782–1873) ===1839=== *Viscount Ebrington (1783–1861) *Sir George Grey, Bt (1799–1882) *The Earl of Uxbridge (1797–1869) *Charles Shaw-Lefevre (1794–1888) *Sir Charles Metcalfe, Bt (1785–1846) *Francis Baring (1796–1866) *Richard Lalor Sheil (1791–1851) *Thomas Babington Macaulay (1800–1859) ===1840=== *The Earl of Clarendon (1800–1870) *The Lord Kinnaird (1807–1878) *Prince Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha (1819–1861) ===1841=== *Sir Joseph Littledale (1767–1842) *Lord Marcus Hill (1798–1863) *The Lord Campbell (1779–1861) *Hon.
